title: Meta, Amazon, Snap, Pinterest: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: The Facebook parent’s shares plunged on its poor results and gloomy outlook; Other tech stocks were also falling
body:
Technology shares are on track to lead losses at the open after Facebook parent Meta Platforms surprised investors with a bigger-than-expected profit drop. Here’s what we’re watching Thursday:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
